Production Co: Revere Entertainment, The Rainbow Film Company, Jagtoria Films
Synopsis: While globetrotting for business, storeowner Dana (Victoria Foyt) arrives at the White Cliffs of Dover, where she meets the engaging English artist Sean (Stephen Dillane). There is an instant attraction between them, but Sean is married and Dana is engaged. Returning home, Dana and her fianc√©, Alex (Michael Brandon), are invited to spend the weekend at a friend's home, and are joined by none other than Sean and his wife. The romance sufficiently rekindled, Dana and Sean face a serious quandary.
Title: Deja Vu
